sentences.english: Last week, something surprising happened.
sentences.chinese: 上周，发生了一件令人惊讶的事。

sentences.english: A pigeon knocked around our window.
sentences.chinese: 一只鸽子在我们窗边徘徊。

sentences.english: It looked boring and sick.
sentences.chinese: 它看起来很无聊、生病了。

sentences.english: We called the animal rescue team for help.
sentences.chinese: 我们打电话给动物救援队求助。

sentences.english: When they arrived, we recognised the team leader.
sentences.chinese: 当他们到达时，我们认出了队长。

sentences.english: "It's my job to save animals," she said.
sentences.chinese: "拯救动物是我的工作,"她说。

sentences.english: "We have researched many kinds of birds.
sentences.chinese: "我们研究过很多种鸟类。

sentences.english: This pigeon is fine, just a bit tired."
sentences.chinese: 这只鸽子没事，只是有点累。"

sentences.english: "But look at the droppings," I said.
sentences.chinese: "但是看看这些粪便,"我说。

sentences.english: "That's not usual."
sentences.chinese: "这不寻常。"

sentences.english: "Don't worry," she answered.
sentences.chinese: "别担心,"她回答。

sentences.english: "Let me check the bird itself."
sentences.chinese: "让我检查一下鸟本身。"

sentences.english: She looked in the mirror to see its reflection better.
sentences.chinese: 她照镜子更好地观察它的反射。

sentences.english: The pigeon looked at itself and seemed surprised.
sentences.chinese: 鸽子看着自己，似乎很惊讶。

sentences.english: "Maybe it flew several kilometres and got lost," I said.
sentences.chinese: "也许它飞了几公里迷路了,"我说。

sentences.english: "What amazing speed it must have!"
sentences.chinese: "它的速度一定很惊人！"

sentences.english: The rescuer nodded.
sentences.chinese: 救援员点了点头。

sentences.english: "But it's safe now.
sentences.chinese: "但它现在安全了。

sentences.english: We have enough food for it."
sentences.chinese: 我们有足够的食物给它。"

sentences.english: She fed the bird madly until it was full.
sentences.chinese: 她疯狂地喂鸟，直到它吃饱。

sentences.english: This story reminds me of another rescue.
sentences.chinese: 这个故事让我想起了另一次救援。

sentences.english: Last year, a beaver and a wolf needed help.
sentences.chinese: 去年，一只海狸和一只狼需要帮助。

sentences.english: They were fantastic animals - engineers of the forest who build amazing homes.
sentences.chinese: 它们是神奇的动物 - 森林工程师，建造了令人惊叹的家。

sentences.english: But they were missing after an earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 但在地震后，它们失踪了。

sentences.english: Our team became heroes that day.
sentences.chinese: 我们的团队那天成为了英雄。

sentences.english: We saved many animals.
sentences.chinese: 我们拯救了很多动物。

sentences.english: The dodo bird is as dead as a dodo - it's gone forever.
sentences.chinese: 渡渡鸟已经彻底灭绝了 - 它永远消失了。

sentences.english: But we can still save other species from dying out.
sentences.chinese: 但我们仍然可以拯救其他物种免于灭绝。

sentences.english: The animals we rescued were sent to a special island museum.
sentences.chinese: 我们救援的动物被送往一个特殊的岛屿博物馆。

sentences.english: There is plenty of food there.
sentences.chinese: 那里有充足的食物。

sentences.english: The forest is peaceful and friendly.
sentences.chinese: 森林宁静而友好。

sentences.english: When the animals arrive, they are safe.
sentences.chinese: 当动物到达时，它们是安全的。

sentences.english: They can live full and happy lives - as happy as a clam!
sentences.chinese: 它们可以过上充实、幸福的生活 - 像蛤蜊一样快乐！

sentences.english: I hope one day, all animals can live in peace.
sentences.chinese: 我希望有一天，所有动物都能和平共处。

sentences.english: That would be a fantastic result for everyone.
sentences.chinese: 这对每个人来说都将是美妙的结果。
